title: The login screen animations dont fit to launcher and it is annoying.
body:
This hapenned for the braum patch, it hapenned for every patch onwards. i didnt notice because i decided to disable the animations
This only happens when the animation is enabled. when it is disabled, it is normal sized.

replies.body: Hey this happens to me too. This is an actual thing.
Idk im using a mid 2023 retina MBP and no problem... The only ing is the retarded shop works 1 out of 10 times...
No problem on my end. Some of your files must be messed up. Are you using a Mac?
Happens to me and I use a PC.
This happens to me on Mac as well, but even with a brand new installation it happens.

My username is SecretAgentHulk if that can help the hax0rz in any way.

In all seriousness, though, why is that a bad idea?

Can someone please explain to me why something needs to be bumped in order to be fixed/noticed? If there is a problem, Shouldn't Riot be working on fixing in the upcoming, or next patch?
It's like saying that there is a problem with the game, & it's "Not noticed," When it clearly is, since we are all signing into League, a great number of us must be seeing this problem.
It only happens on my laptop for me. My desktop has never had this problem.
yeah happens to me too, you can check the "disable animation" box for the image to fill the frame. I think it's got something to do with the screen resolution. Not sure.
